name: Business-File-Loading-And-Validating
description: Validates item transaction data against master data, classifying records into Good and Bad entries to ensure data accuracy and integrity.

appStages.name: Introduction
Master Table
View Data
Good transaction Data

      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eGood Transactions\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003e\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eClick on \u0027Extract Good Items\u0027 to Identify and extract Good Records—entries uploaded till now  helping highlight data quality issues for correction.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n   \u003c/div\u003e",
